are not interested in receiving mails from us then please=C2=A0forward this
mail with &quot;remove&quot; in the subject to <a href=3D"mailto:remove@ram=
yinfotech.com" title=3D"blocked::mailto:remove@ramyinfotech.com" target=3D"=
_blank">remove@ramyinfotech.com</a></span></b>.=C2=A0Sorry
for any inconvenience</span></font></i><font face=3D"Garamond"><span style=
=3D"font-family:Garamond"><u></u><u></u></span></font></p>

<p class=3D"MsoNormal"><font size=3D"3" face=3D"Garamond"><span style=3D"fo=
nt-size:12.0pt;font-family:Garamond"><u></u>=C2=A0<u></u></span></font></p>
